name: AKILJIK
description:
Made this crappy game in 5 hours for Nokia Jam 4. Yeah yeah, TIC-80 again, but that was best option for now. I'm also currently making games in other tools, so don't worry.

Archive include Windows, Linux and Mac versions (only Windows tested) and readme file, but things are pretty basic.

Use WASD to avoid bullets, then use WASD between waves to choose upgrade. All of them, except SCORE, have maximum value after which you can't upgrade further. SPEED increase your speed, TIME decrease time you need to survive each wave, SLOWDOWN decrease speed of bullets. Do I need to explain SCORE?
